title: TikTok Shop Campaign VA
job_overview:
???? About the Role:
We’re looking for a smart, reliable, and proactive Virtual Assistant to support TikTok Shop campaigns for multiple UK-based brands. You'll act as the operational backbone — tracking performance, managing creator communication, posting links, updating sheets, and ensuring no detail is missed.

???? This is not a social media content role. You’ll work behind the scenes to help us run smooth, scalable, and profitable campaigns.

???? What You’ll Do (Daily Tasks):
Check TikTok Shop Seller Centres (3–4 brands) and log daily performance

Post high-commission affiliate links in our Upgrade to see actual info server

Approve sample requests from creators and update logs

Track which creators have posted and update campaign reports

Follow up with creators who haven’t posted yet

Update Google Sheets or Notion dashboards

Invite creators to follow TikTok brand pages

Research trending content hooks and formats (basic level)

???? Weekly Tasks:
Pull weekly reports for each brand (GMV, clicks, video posts, top creators)

Maintain clean creator and campaign tracking sheets

Vet new creator applicants using a provided checklist

Assist with campaign launches and document organisation

Tidy inboxes, label important messages, and track follow-ups

Brand Outreach via Amazon UK:

Identify 10–20 UK-based Amazon brands not currently using TikTok Shop

Add brand leads to a Google Sheet (including product links + contact info)

Send outreach emails (template and tools provided)

Track replies and update lead status for follow-up

? Ideal Skills & Requirements:
Strong written English and clear communication

Highly organised with strong attention to detail

Confident using Google Sheets / Excel

Quick to learn tools like TikTok Shop, Upgrade to see actual info, Notion

Self-motivated and proactive — not afraid to take initiative

Reliable — consistent daily availability and strong work ethic

Bonus: TikTok Shop or affiliate marketing experience is a plus

? Working Hours:
Full-time, Monday to Friday

UK business hours: 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM UK time

Occasional flexibility is fine, but daytime UK availability is essential
